author: cbs8
title: International Superstar, Vishal Singh, represents FHI Brands in new campaigns and walks in Fashion Week Los Angeles, Art Hearts Fashion
text:
FHI Brands
Vishal Singh is a prestigious actor in India who has become the next male model for FHI's global expansion of hair tools.
HOLLYWOOD, Calif. , Oct. 13, FHI Brands is excited to announce the expansion into new countries and the partnership with actor and model superstar, Vishal Singh . FHI is branching out and showcasing tutorials online featuring more How To's for men from creating beachy waves to the distinguished coiffed, James Dean , side part using tools such as the STYLUS and the FHI Heat Platform line .
As the Official Hair Sponsor of Fashion Week Los Angeles - Art Hearts Fashion , the FHI Brands hair teams worked behind the scenes with each designer on creating hair concepts using FHI Heat tools and Prive products that illuminated the runways. India Superstar , Vishal Singh showed the Los Angeles fashion scene what FHI Heat tools can do, walking for Koco Blaq and Mister Triple X .
Additionally, FHI Brands wants more professionals to be interactive in styling at Fashion Week that it is integrating how to get male and female looks from select shows. Viewers can tune into FHI Heat's YouTube channel and learn how to achieve the runway hair styles along with some ready-to-wear looks from the likes of Nicole Miller and Stello Official by Stephanie and Michael Costello .
"Growth is exciting. Moving into our 71,000 square foot headquarters, expanding the marketing of our products and partnering with powerhouses such as Vishal Singh and Fashion Week Los Angeles is exhilarating. Looking back three years ago, we were nowhere near where we are today. Art Hearts Fashion is also fantastic because like FHI Brands, they give back by working with the Make a Wish Foundation, and making wishes come true is what our company is all about." - Shauky Gulamani, President and CEO FHI Brands
